items.description: Currently working on the front-end team for UPS, building reusable components, handling complex UI states, and optimizing performance across large-scale applications. Collaborate closely with designers, product managers, and backend engineers to translate requirements into intuitive and reliable interfaces. Previously, contributed to the Monotype project from scratch using Next.js and Algolia, including preparing and presenting client demos.

At Robosoft Technologies, I built, styled, and shipped high-quality websites, design systems, and mobile apps for clients including ICICI Lombard, Axis Mutual Fund, and Yoss. I worked closely with designers and backend teams to translate requirements into maintainable, user-friendly interfaces, and ensured smooth deployment across web and mobile platforms. This included building apps using Angular and Ionic, which were successfully published on both the Play Store and App Store. My focus was always on creating scalable, reliable, and visually polished experiences for end users.
